userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation: [Identification of item], New Monmouth Presbyterian Church Records, WLU Coll. 0168, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections' staff to verify the appropriate format.

altformavail.head: Existence and Location of Copies
altformavail.p: Aspects of this collection have been microfilmed.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes deacons' minutes, sunday school records, the church register, cemetery records, congregational meeting minutes, and financial records of New Monmouth Presbyterian Church. Also includes some issues of the New Monmouth News/Newsletter, August 1979 - December 1981, March 1984, December 1987, May 2001, no date.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research use.

did.unittitle: Sunday School records and Church register

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sunday School records, 1921-1931, and Church Register, 1771-1959

did.unittitle: Congregational meeting minutes, pew rents, scrapbooks, and history of the church

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Congregational meeting minutes 1851-1916; pew rents; scrapbooks 1980-1981, 1982-1984; history of the church 1912

did.unittitle: Women of the Church Executive Board minutes, Secretary's books, Treasurer's books

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Women of the Church Executive Board minutes 1951-1956, Secretary's books 1951-1956, Treasurer's books 1914-1955

did.unittitle: Session minutes and Congregational meeting minutes
Receipts and expenses, Foreign mission receipts, Pastor's salary account, LH and FMA minutes, Circle No. 8 minutes, WA minutes, letter

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Receipts and expenses 1911-1927; Foreign mission receipts1906-1931; Pastor's salary account 1907-1912, 1921-1924; LH and FMA minutes 1913-1918; Circle No. 8 minutes 1927-1933; WA minutes 1923-1924; letter 1907

did.unittitle: Session minutes, sessional record of KCBPC, and session book of the Chesnut Grove Presbyterian Church

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Session minutes 1848-1858, 1858-1892, 1920-1935; sessional record of KCBPC 1903-1929; session book of the Chesnut Grove Presbyterian Church 1910-1921
